an3.25:4.3: Arukūpamacitto puggalo, vijjūpamacitto puggalo, vajirūpamacitto puggalo*.
an3.25:4.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an3.25:4.6: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, duṭṭhāruko kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭito bhiyyoso mattāya āsavaṃ deti;
an3.25:4.7: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
an3.25:5.1: * Katamo ca, bhikkhave, vijjūpamacitto puggalo?
an3.25:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an3.25:5.3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, cakkhumā puriso rattandhakāratimisāyaṃ vijjantarikāya rūpāni passeyya;
an3.25:5.4: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe …
an3.25:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an3.25:6.3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, vajirassa natthi kiñci abhejjaṃ maṇi vā pāsāṇo vā;
an3.25:6.4: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo āsavānaṃ khayā … pe …
an3.25:6.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
